No game tells the story of World War II in Europe like Totaler Krieg!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This new edition of our popular Krieg! game is still the same highly playable, unpredictable and enjoyable experience it always has been. What_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s new is a design and graphic update and expansion to give you more options -- especially if you want to explore the critical pre-war period from 1937 to 1939. What if the Republicans had won the Spanish Civil War? What if Germany and Russia hadn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t signed their Non-Aggression Pact? What if France had modernized its army instead of building the Maginot Line? All of these options are literally in the cards that form the strategies of the three factions -- Axis, Soviet Allies, and Western Allies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Best of all, Totaler Krieg! can be linked with its new Pacific companion game, Axis Empires: Dai Senso!, to play the joint Axis Empires scenario, an eye-opening global look at all of World War II. The fate of the world is in your hands!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Totaler Krieg means Total War in German. In the game, play moves from Pre-War (where players mobilize their forces and engage in diplomacy) to Limited War (when open conflict begins) to Total War -- at that point, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s all-out warfare to achieve victory!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Includes:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Two 22 x 34 inch maps_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 840 counters on three countersheets_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 200 cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A 64-page rulebook_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A 24-page scenario book_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Play aids and force pool displays_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Decision Games (DCG 1022) Totaler Krieg! This game stretches from the fjords of Narvik to the sands at El Alamein, from the gates of Moscow to the sandy beaches of Normandy, from the Spanish Civil War to the last days in Berlin and everything in between. No game tells the story of World War II in Europe like Totaler Krieg! This new edition of our popular Krieg! game is still the same highly playable, unpredictable and enjoyable experience it always has been. What’s new is a design and graphic update and expansion to give you more options -- especially if you want to explore the critical pre-war period from 1937 to 1939. What if the Republicans had won the Spanish Civil War? What if Germany and Russia hadn’t signed their Non-Aggression Pact? What if France had modernized its army instead of building the Maginot Line? All of these options are literally in the cards that form the strategies of the three factions -- Axis, Soviet Allies, and Western Allies. Best of all, Totaler Krieg! can be linked with its new Pacific companion game, Axis Empires: Dai Senso!, to play the joint Axis Empires scenario, an eye-opening global look at all of World War II. The fate of the world is in your hands! Totaler Krieg means Total War in German. In the game, play moves from Pre-War (where players mobilize their forces and engage in diplomacy) to Limited War (when open conflict begins) to Total War -- at that point, it’s all-out warfare to achieve victory!

Decision Games (DCG 1022) Totaler Krieg! This game stretches from the fjords of Narvik to the sands at El Alamein, from the gates of Moscow to the sandy beaches of Normandy, from the Spanish Civil War to the last days in Berlin and everything in between. No game tells the story of World War II in Europe like Totaler Krieg! This new edition of our popular Krieg! game is still the same highly playable, unpredictable and enjoyable experience it always has been. What’s new is a design and graphic update and expansion to give you more options -- especially if you want to explore the critical pre-war period from 1937 to 1939. What if the Republicans had won the Spanish Civil War? What if Germany and Russia hadn’t signed their Non-Aggression Pact? What if France had modernized its army instead of building the Maginot Line? All of these options are literally in the cards that form the strategies of the three factions -- Axis, Soviet Allies, and Western Allies. Best of all, Totaler Krieg! can be linked with its new Pacific companion game, Axis Empires: Dai Senso!, to play the joint Axis Empires scenario, an eye-opening global look at all of World War II. The fate of the world is in your hands! Totaler Krieg means Total War in German. In the game, play moves from Pre-War (where players mobilize their forces and engage in diplomacy) to Limited War (when open conflict begins) to Total War -- at that point, it’s all-out warfare to achieve victory!

Decision Games (DCG 1022) This game stretches from the fjords of Narvik to the sands of El Alamein, from the gates of Moscow to the beaches of Normandy, from the Spanish Civil War to the last days in Berlin and everything in between. No game tells the story of World War II in Europe like Totaler Krieg! This new edition of our popular Krieg! game is still the playable, unpredictable and enjoyable experience it’s always been. What’s new is a design and graphic update and expansion to give you more options – especially if you want to explore the critical pre-war period from 1937 to 1939. What if the Republicans had won the Spanish Civil War? What if Germany and Russia hadn’t signed their Non-Aggression Pact? What if France had modernized its army instead of building the Maginot Line? All of these options are literally in the cards that form the strategy for the major powers. Best of all, Totaler Krieg! can be linked with its new Pacific War companion game, Dai Senso!, to play the joint Axis Empires scenario, a global eye opening look at all of World War II. The fate of the world is in your hands! Totaler Krieg! means Total War in German. Total War refers to the moment in the game when play moves from Limited War with its combination of mobilization, maneuver, and diplomacy to Total War with it’s all out warfare to achieve victory.
In shrink. My web site is www.panzermatters.com

Complete and in pristine condition. Box is clean with no visible wear. Counters neatly clipped, sorted, and bagged. Cards in like-new condition and neatly secured with magic tape. Maps like-new with minimal or no edge/crease wear. Charts, rules, etc., all in excellent or better condition. Shipping weight is just under 5lb, so shipping in the US will be USPS Parcel Post, with the exact rate depending on your distance from CA (probably about $8-$15).
Punched, one scenario played, counters trays included
In shrink, latest edition

Although the counters are removed from the sprues, corners neatly trimmed and sorted, the rest of the game is in mint condition (the faction cards are still in shrink wrap). Counters stored in 3 GMT storage trays which are included in the sale. I threw the original copy of the rules out and downloaded the updated Oct 2012 version, printed in colour and stapled. P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P in the UK, £10.00, rest of Europe £14.00.

All components in very good condition. Payment by Paypal or wire transfer.

Condition - Unpunched and unplayed, box has slight shelf wear. Components in like new condition. Note - if purchased with the companion game Axis Empires: Dai Senso!, will bulk lot sell the pair for $110.00 plus shipping. Payment by PayPal in advance or cash on pickup. For shipping this is considered a very large size game. The following options are available for delivery within the continental United States: 1) Local pickup in the San Jose, California area (no cost) 2) USPS Priority Mail Flat Rate - $6.60 (small), $12.65 (medium), or $17.15 (large), depending on game size. Generally very small games fit in the small box, small or medium in the medium box, and large in the large box. Box fits for some games are very snug, allowing minimal protective padding - if this shipping option is picked for such games seller assumes no responsibility for damage during transit. 3) USPS Parcel Select Ground / Non-Flat Rate Priority - varies, usually only cheaper than Flat Rate Priority for small and very light weight games (under 2 pounds), an additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. 4) FedEx Ground - varies, usually from $12 for short distance shipments of light weight games to $30 for heavy games (or multiple games up to 10 pounds) long distance shipments. This is usually the cheapest option for very large games. An additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. While expensive, this is the best method if damage during transit is a concern, as all items will be packed in boxes sufficiently sized for protective materials. Shipping rates to Alaska or Hawaii will be higher for FedEx. Games will not be shipped by any method other than a shipping box, nor unboxed or in less than complete condition, please do not ask.
Unpunched, complete. Minimal cosmetic box wear.

Shrinkwrap copy. No box damage. Shrink is split along one side panel. Card driven corps level recreation of the entire war. Lots of different possibilities here with many _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;what ifs_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. Worldwide shipping and will be packed well. All forms of negotiable instruments considered. Combine ship with mulitiple purchases.

I played through each scenario and campaign game once. Many minor nation or special forces pieces unpunched. Virtually no wear and tear or shelf wear. There are many notes and articles I printed out included to clarify certain rules or strategies. You will not be disappointed for this price. Lifetime gamer. Non smoker. I suspect I won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t tackle it again, and want somebody else to play it.
Weight : 1.7 kg Please ask for shipping rate to your country.
Most counters punched, sorted and bagged. Complete. Will ship via USPS
Shrink wrap removed, but that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s about it. Unplayed. Unpunched.

Shipping to Canadian addresses will cost an additional $25.00 on top of the charge of the game itself. If you are purchasing this game and live outside of Canada, please contact me prior to purchasing the game for a shipping quote. If you have any additional questions, please do not hesitate to message me and ask prior to purchasing! :)
